title: Kog'Maw
body:
So recently I submitted a ticket on the Riot Support page and was kindly helped by someone named Slug. I asked him if he was able to change the Kog'Maw model to the picture below. He said I should bring it to the boards and hope a dev noticed it. He also supplied me with ability icons aswell.

[New Model](https://imgur.com/jEc6Qw6)

[Abilities](https://imgur.com/pielPBt)

replies.body:
YOOOOOO I thought dem icons looked a little familiar though fam hahaha xD! 

Great ideas, love the hard work! You should def post this over in Concepts and Creations to see what others think ^_^

This is the first time I've used the LoL boards and it says I need to be level 7 to create a discussion in the Concepts and Creations tab. If you could help me with that it would be really appreciated! Also thank you so much for the feedback :D
{{champion:27}}
Oh! Once you hit level 7 I believe you'll be able to freely post anywhere. No worries though, this'll be a freebie. Feel free to repost this over there if you'd like once you levelup!

Nice! Thank you and keep up the good work at Riot :D
{{champion:27}}
